amountMatchExplanation: You don't have the exact amount, but you can use the closest available amount or select custom banknotes.
backupDeletedSuccess: Your backup of minibits tokens has been deleted. New tokens will NOT be backed up.
backupInvalidMnemonicError: Corrupted or invalid seed phrase. Please move funds and reinstall this wallet.
backupLocalBackupDescription: Local backup stores a copy of all your ecash in the local database. Ecash is never deleted unless you switch off the backup. Please note that this backup is not encrypted.
backupMnemonicDescription: This 12 word sequence represents your seed and allows you to recover your ecash balance in case of device loss. Keep them in safe place.
backupRecoveryToolDescription: Filter and export all ecash from local database grouped by mint keysets.
backupRemoteBackupDescription: Seed phrase encodes your seed and allows you to recover your ecash balance in case of device loss.
backupRemoveSpentCoinsDescription: This tool removes spent ecash from the balance.
backupResult: Spent ecash proofs were removed from the wallet.
backupSuccess: Your minibits tokens were backed up to local database. New tokens will be backed up automatically.
backupWalletBackupDescription: Export wallet backup so that you can import it into a new device.
backupWillOverwriteBalanceWarning: Your wallet has non zero-balance. If you continue, existing ecash will be deleted and replaced by backup.
checkAndSyncDesc: Checks that contact name is still linked to the same pubkey and updates picture if it was changed.
confirmBackupRecovery: Do you really want to recover ecash from the backup?
confirmMintRemoval: Do you really want to remove %{hostname} - %{shortname} from the wallet?
contactHasNoLightningAddrUseEcash: This contact does not have a Lightning address, send ecash instead.
contactsScreen_ownName_betaWarning: Please accept this is an early beta software. Your data can still be lost due to a bug or unexpected data loss.
contactsScreen_ownName_donationSubtext: kindly asks you for a small donation for your new wallet address.
contactsScreen_ownName_donationSuccess: Thank you! Donation for %{receiver} has been successfully paid.
contactsScreen_ownName_illegalChar: Do not use . or - characters at the beginning or the end of name.
contactsScreen_ownName_insufficient: Your wallet balance is not enough to pay this invoice amount but you can still pay it from another wallet.
contactsScreen_ownName_payToGetOwnName: Pay the following lightning invoice and get your %{name} wallet name.
contactsScreen_ownName_profileExists: This wallet name is already in use, choose another one.
contactsScreen_ownName_tooShort: Please use at least 2 characters for your name
contactsScreen_privateContacts_bottomMod: Private contacts are public addresses of other Minibits wallets or even any Nostr users. You can use them to send or request ecash and you can safely share your own with others.
contactsScreen_privateContacts_explainer: Add other Minibits users as your private contacts. Every user gets sharable @minibits.cash wallet address. You can pay privately to your contacts anytime even if they are offline.
contactsScreen_privateContacts_profileNo: Profile name %{name} could not be found. Make sure the name is correct.
contactsScreen_privateContacts_saveNewFo: Please enter a wallet address in name@domain.xyz format
contactsScreen_privateContacts_selectSen: Select contact to send Lightning payment to.
Select contact to send your payment request to.
Select contact to send your ecash to.
contactsScreen_privateContacts_switchNam: Switch your wallet name and picture?
Get cooler wallet name or profile picture. Select from an array of random names and images or opt for your own @minibits.cash wallet name.
contactsScreen_publicContacts_npubPasteE: Copy your NPUB key before pasting
contactsScreen_publicContacts_searchNoRe: No profiles found matching your search
contactsScreen_publicContacts_searchErro: Error searching for profiles. Please try again.
copyMnemonicBackupWorkaround: To apply backup to your existing funds, send your entire balance to yourself. Otherwise, only funds from this point onward can be restored.
decodedMissingCurrencyUnit: Currency unit is missing in the received token. Wallet will assume token amount is in bitcoin $%{unit}. Do not continue if you are not sure this is correct.
deleteContactDesc: Remove this contact from your wallet.
derivingSeedStatus: Deriving seed, this takes a while...
developerScreen_forceDeletePendingDescri: Removes ecash from pending state and deletes all pending transactions.
developerScreen_forceMovePendingDescript: Move pending ecash back to spendable balance.
developerScreen_clearJwtTokensDescriptio: Removes lightning address server authentication data.
developerScreen_resetDescription: This will wipe out all local data from storage and from the local database. Do only during development or testing.
developerScreen_resyncTransactionsDescri: Refresh recent transactions history from database.
developerScreen_transactionsDescription: There are %{count} recent transactions cached in the app's fast storage. Resetting will reload them from the app's database. Do only during development or testing.

generic.content: There is nothing to display at the moment.
generic.heading: No data available

errorScreen_friendlySubtitle: Unfortunately, the Minibits app encountered an unexpected error. Please contact us at support@minibits.cash or raise an issue on Github.
factoryResetSuccess: Factory reset completed, please restart immediately.
factoryResetUserConfirmDesc: All application data will be deleted. Are you sure you want to perform a factory reset?
importBackupWalletProfileNotFound: Wallet profile linked to the provided seed not found, new one will be created for you.
increaseRecoveryIndexesDesc: In case you encounter 'outputs already signed' error, use this tool to resolve the issue.
lightningInvoiceSharedWaiting: Lightning invoice has been shared, waiting to be paid by receiver.
lightningPayScreen_onPasteEmptyClipboard: First copy Lightning invoice, address or pay code to pay to. Then paste.
loglevelDebugDesc: Log details, set only if testing or on request by support.
loglevelErrorDesc: Log errors and crashes only, without private data.
loglevelInfoDesc: Log anonymous usage, without private data.
mintsScreen_invalidUrl: This is not a valid URL.
mintsScreen_keepAtLeastOneMint: You need to keep at least 1 mint.
mintsScreen_mintBlocked: The mint has been blocked. The wallet will not receive ecash from this mint.
mintsScreen_mintUnblocked: The mint has been unblocked. You can now receive ecash from this mint.
mintsScreen_mintUrlHint: Provide the URL of a trusted mint.
missingMintsForProofsUserMessage: Please add all mints belonging to your proofs to the wallet and try again.
missingMintUnitRouteParamsError: Missing mint unit in route params.
noSpentEcashFound: No spent ecash found in your wallet.
nostr_enterAddressDesc: Minibits uses Nostr address (nip05) as a sharable contact to send and receive ecash.
nostr_invalidAddressFormat: Invalid NOSTR address, please check that it follows name@domain.com format
nostr_lastStandDialog_desc: Using your own Nostr address will disable Lightning address features unique to minibits.cash address.
nostr_lastStandDialog_readyDesc: Wallet needs to restart to apply this change.
nostr_minibitsNameKeyReuseError: %{domain} names and keys can't be used with multiple wallets.
nostr_pasteError: Copy your NOSTR address first, then paste.
nostr_profileRelayMismatchedIdentifierEr: Profile from the relay does not match the given nip05 identifier
nostr_removePubSubText: Remove your npub key and stop loading public contacts.
nostr_setPublicKeySubText: Add or change your NOSTR social network public key (npub).
nostr_setRelaySubText: Add or change your own relay if your profile and follows are not hosted on the default relays.
nostr_tipSubText: Add your Nostr social network public key (npub) and tip or donate to your favourite people and projects directly from the minibits wallet.
nostr_useOwnProfile_desc: Import your own Nostr address and keys. Your wallet will stop communicating with minibits.cash Nostr and LNURL address servers, disabling Lightning address features for receiving zaps and payments. Only for hardcore ecash-ers!
nsecEnterPrivateKeyDesc: Minibits needs your private key in nsec format in order to decrypt messages containing incoming payments. Your key will be stored in your device secure key vault.
nsecPasteError: Copy your nsec key first, then paste.
nsecPrivatePublicKeyMismatchError: Provided private key does not match your new profile public key.
nwcScreen_connectionExists: Connection with this name already exists.
nwcScreen_dailyLimitHint: Set maximal daily limit to spend
nwcScreen_limitMustBePositive: Daily limit must be above zero
nwcScreen_nameConnectionHint: Name your connection by the app you will use it with
nwcScreen_nwcDescription: NWC lets you control your wallet from another application, such as your favourite Nostr app. Allow access only to the apps you trust. Your device must have push notifications enabled and stay online.
nwcScreen_nwcSummary: NWC lets you control your wallet from another application, such as your favourite Nostr app.
nwcScreen_pushNotificationWarning: Your device can not receive background push messages. This is essential to recieve NWC commands. As a fallback, Minibits subscribed to Nostr relays to receive NWC commands.
nwcScreen_shareDescription: Scan or copy this connection string to another application to allow it to connect to your wallet. Use only with apps you trust.
pasteEcashTokenDesc: Ecash token you want to receive.
payCommon_insufficientFunds: There are not enough funds to send this amount.
payWithLightningDesc: Enter or paste Lightning address, invoice or LNURL pay code you want to pay to.
pictureRetrieveFail: Could not retrieve pictures from the server, try again later.
privacyScreen_loggerDescription: Log anonymous error information in order to identify and fix wallet bugs during beta testing. Switch off for best privacy.
privacyScreen_torDaemonDescription: Allow connections with mints through Tor .onion addresses.
privacyScreen_derivedKeysDescription: Your Nostr keys are deterministically derived from your wallet seed phrase. This is now default behavior on Minibits.
privacyScreen_legacyKeysDescription: Your wallet uses random Nostr keys. Upgrade to derive them from your seed for easier recovery.
profileMissingNostrAddress: This profile does not have a Nostr address.
profileOnboarding_desc: Your minibits.cash wallet address allows you to receive encrypted ecash over Nostr. Simultaneously, it serves as your Lightning address, enabling you to receive payments from any Lightning wallet or zaps on the Nostr social network.
profileOnboarding_minibitsDesc: Share your wallet address to receive encrypted ecash over Nostr. This also serves as your Lightning address, enabling you to receive payments from any Lightning wallet or zaps on the Nostr social network.
profileOnboarding_ownAddrDesc: You are using your own Nostr address to send and receive ecash. Please note that this setup does not allow you to receive Nostr zaps or Lightning payments to this address.
profilePublicKeyMismatchError: Profile from relays public key differs from yor wallet pubkey. Reset this profile in Privacy settings and import again with new keys.
profileScreen_batchReceiveDesc: Recommended for heavy zap collectors. If there are more payments or zaps received to your lightning address, batch them into a single one.
profileScreen_changeAvatarSubtext: Select one from randomly generated pictures.
profileScreen_changeWalletaddressSubtext: Change unique wallet address. Select one of randomly generated or choose your own.
profileToRecoverDesc: This is the wallet address linked to your seed. If you continue, your wallet profile will reset to above seed and address.
qr_fail: Could not display QR code, use option to copy or send the token to the payee wallet address.
receiveScreen_newMintsAdded_one: %{count} mint has been added to your wallet
receiveScreen_newMintsAdded_other: %{count} mints have been added to your wallet
receiveScreen_pasteoReceiveDescription: Paste ecash token to receive it into your wallet.
receiveScreen_scanToReceiveDescription: Scan or paste ecash token or LNURL withdraw link to receive into your wallet.
receiveScreen_sharePaymentRequestDescrip: Send payment request to one of your contacts, so that the payer can pay you exact amount.
receiveScreen_showOrShareInvoiceDescript: Present or share lightning invoice for an amount you want to receive.
recovery_addressLinkedToSeed: This is the wallet address linked to the provided seed.
recovery_doNotLoseEcashDesc: Your current wallet seed phrase will NOT be changed. Keep it in a safe place!
recovery_missingMnemonicSeedProfileError: Missing seed phrase or seed or profile to recover.
recovery_mnemonicCollisionDesc: Your wallet already has another seed phrase in its secure storage. Recovery process works only with freshly installed wallet to avoid loss of your funds.
recovery_noWalletForSeedError: Could not find wallet address linked to your seed on the server.
recovery_ownKeysImportAgain: You used wallet address %{addr} with your own keys, import it again.
recovery_resultExpired: Nothing has been found in this recovery interval.
recovery_resultSpent: Good news is that already spent Ecash has been found. Continue with next recovery interval.
recovery_seedFromCurrentDeviceError: Can not use seed from this device.
recovery_selectKeyset: Select keyset to be used for recovery
recovery_startIndexDesc: Use to increase starting index of recovery interval e.g. in case of repeated recovery. You need to know at what index you completed your previous recovery or you'll miss ecash to recover.
recoveryFromMintsDesc: Identify mints to recover your ecash from and add them to the list.
recoveryInsertMnemonicDesc: Paste or rewrite 12 word phrase to recover your ecash balance and wallet address on this device. Separate words by blank spaces.
recoveryInsertMnemonicDescAddrOnly: Paste or rewrite 12 word phrase to recover your wallet address on this device. Separate words by blank spaces.
recoveryInsertMnemonicDescImportBackup: Paste or rewrite 12 word phrase to recover your wallet address on this device. Separate words by blank spaces.
recoveryInvalidMnemonicError: Invalid seed phrase. Provide 12 word sequence separated by blank spaces.
recoveryMeltQuoteDesc: Retry to receive back unspent ecash from a completed Lightning payment.
recoveryMeltSuccessMessage: Successfully recovered %{amount} SAT from the provided melt quote.
recoveryMintQuoteDesc: Retry to mint ecash from an already paid mint quote.
recoveryMintSuccessMessage: Successfully minted %{amount} SAT from the provided mint quote.
recoveryOptionsFromBackupDescription: Import backup exported from another Minibits wallet. Easy option if you move to a new device.
recoveryOptionsFromSeedDescription: Use 12 word seed phrase to re-create your lost ecash with assistance of mints. Use in case of device loss.
seedRecoveryOptionsDesc: Recover your wallet using seed phrase or backup file
recoveryPermissionNeededDesc: Minibits needs a permission to display notification while this task will be running.
recoveryScreen_recoverMeltQuoteChangeDes: Retry to receive back unspent ecash from a completed Lightning payment.
recoveryScreen_recoverMintQuoteDesc: Retry to mint ecash from an already paid mint quote.
relayurlPasteError: Copy your relay URL key before pasting
removingMintLostBalanceWarning: Your wallet has non-zero balance with this mint. If removed, your ecash will be lost!
resetAborted: Reset aborted, there are no transactions in local database.
resetCompletedDetail: Reset completed. %{transCount} recent transactions were loaded from database.
resetOwnProfileDesc: Stop using your own NOSTR address and re-create Minibits wallet profile.
saveContactPrivateDesc: Save %{nip05} to your Private contacts so you can pay faster
scanReceiveExtractFail: Could not extract ecash token nor LNURL withdraw link to receive.
scanScreen_onPasteEmptyClipboard: First copy ecash token, invoice, LNURL link or lightning address. Then paste.
securityScreen_biometricAuthDescription: Require biometric authentication for Minibits to start.
securityScreen_biometryAvailable: Biometric authentication is now required for Minibits to start.
securityScreen_biometryNone: You have not setup biometric authentication or your device does not support it.
securityScreen_posAuthDescription: Require biometric authentication when leaving wallet POS mode.
sendLockEcashDesc: Lock ecash token to one of your contacts or to a public key. Only the receiver will be able to unlock it.
sendOffline_usageHint: Tap the ecash notes to adjust the amount
sendOfflineApproxMatch: No exact match for your requested amount was found.
sendOfflineExactDenoms: You can only send exact ecash denominations while you are offline.
sendScreen_pasteToSendDescription: Paste lightning invoice from clipboard to pay it from your wallet.
sendScreen_scanToPayDescription: Scan Lightning invoice, LNURL pay code or Lightning address to pay.
sendScreen_sendToContactDescription: Send your ecash to one of your contacts stored in your contact list.
sendScreen_showOrShareTokenDescription: Present or share ecash token for an amount you want to send.
settingsScreen_restartTheme: Restart the wallet to apply the new theme.
showOnboardingDesc: Go through onboarding screens again next time you restart Minibits.
syncOwnProfileDesc: Synchronize your profile name and picture with up to date information from Nostr relays.
tokenReceiveScreen_onPasteEmptyClipboard: First copy ecash token, then paste.
topup_invoiceCreatedDescParam: Your selected mint balance to top up is %{mintUrl}
topup_missingMintAddFirstDesc: There is no mint connected to your wallet eligible for receiving ecash.
topup_nostrDMreceived: nostr:%{npub} sent you Lightning invoice for %{amount} %{currency} from Minibits wallet!
topup_relayMissingSentEvent: Relay could not confirm that the message has been published.
topup_withdrawAvailableDesc: Up to %{amount} %{code} are available to withdraw
tranDetailScreen_successRetrieveEcashAft: Ecash has been successfully received after retry. New transaction has been created.
tranDetailScreen_tokenTrackingDesc: Logged ecash tokens for debugging purposes
tranHistory_deleteErroredDesc: This will delete %{count} transactions with errors
transferScreen_donationSuccessMessage: Donation for %{donationForName} has been successfully paid and your wallet address has been updated. Thank you!
transferScreen_insufficientFunds: There is not enough balance in %{currency} to pay the invoice amount and expected fees: %{amount} %{currency}
transferScreen_LUD18unsupported: Minibits does not yet support entering of payer identity data (LUD18).
transferScreen_noMintWithBalance: There is no mint with %{unit} balance from which payment can be made.
transferScreen_selectMintFrom: Select mint balance to transfer from
updateModal_desc: Updates provide new functionalities and important bug fixes. View details in the Update manager.
updateScreen_nativeUpdateAvailableDesc: There is a new native version of Minibits Wallet in the Google Play Store.
updateScreen_updateAvailableDesc: There is a new Over-the-Air update of Minibits Wallet ready to download and install.
updateScreen_updateNotAvailableDesc: Good, you are running the latest version of the app.
userErrorMissingLightningData: Missing Lightning invoice, paycode or address.
walletAddressRecoveryDesc: Use your seed phrase from another device to get your original wallet address on this device. This will not recover balances.
walletScreen_paymentSentSuccess: Payment request has been successfully sent.
walletScreen_payWithLightningDesc: Pay invoice or to a Lightning address
walletScreen_sendEcashDesc: Share ecash or send it to one of your contacts
walletScreen_topupWithLightningDesc: Create Lightning invoice to topup your balance
welcomeScreen_generatingWalletSeedStatus: Creating wallet seed, this takes a while...
welcomeScreen_lastPageConfirmButton: Got it, take me to the wallet
welcomeScreen_offlineWarning: Please make sure you are online to set up the new wallet.
welcomeScreen_page1_bullet1: Minibits follows the Cashu protocol, where mints back ecash with Bitcoin.
welcomeScreen_page1_bullet2: Ecash is issued or converted back to Bitcoin instantly via Lightning payments.
welcomeScreen_page1_bullet3: Ecash tokens are stored on-device; mints do not maintain ledgers or wallet balances.
welcomeScreen_page1_intro: Minibits is an ecash and Lightning wallet focused on ease of use and security. Ecash is a digitally signed token issued by custodians known as mints.
welcomeScreen_page2_bullet1: Minibits provides a free Lightning address that also allows instant ecash transfers over Nostr.
welcomeScreen_page2_bullet2: First-class support for sending and receiving zaps on Nostr, including Nostr Wallet Connect.
welcomeScreen_page2_bullet3: Realtime encrypted push notifications and support for ecash issued in currencies other than Bitcoin.
welcomeScreen_page2_final: Minibits is free, open-source software. Find us on GitHub for our roadmap and contributions.
welcomeScreen_page2_intro: Minibits aims to explore how ecash can help people use Bitcoin by offering frictionless onboarding, low fees, ease of use, and strong privacy.
welcomeScreen_page3_bullet1: Mints are custodial by design. Run your own or use them only for research and testing.
welcomeScreen_page3_bullet2: Ecash is stored on your device. If lost, ecash is lost unless you safely back up your seed phrase.
welcomeScreen_page3_bullet3: Minibits offers its own mint for testing with small amounts. It operates on a best-effort basis with no guarantees.
welcomeScreen_page3_intro: Both the Cashu protocol and the Minibits wallet are experimental. By using them, you accept known and unknown risks.
